description:
Bananya and Baby Sweet are summoned to a magic school where young witches and wizards learn. Their eyes gleam as they see magic for the first time. Then they meet Wizard Bananya, who isn`t very good with summoning magic, and try to cheer him on. He fails repeatedly at summoning, but Bananya is smiling...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: まほうがっこうにようこそ, にゃ!
